API_Description: Changes the page layout of the current document. Valid values are: ``` SinglePage OneColumn TwoColumnLeft TwoColumnRight ``` In Acrobat 6.0 and later, there are two additional properties: ``` TwoPageLeft TwoPageRight ```
Examples:
Example: Put the document into a continuous facing layout where the first page of the document appears in the left column:

```
this.layout = "TwoColumnLeft";
```
